name: TI_2_2_1_Audit_Log_Indelibility
title: TI.2.2.1 Audit Log Indelibility (Function)
purpose: Audit logs must be maintained in a persistent and indelible form according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and jurisdictional law.

statement.label: TI.2.2.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL manage each Audit Log entry as a persistent, indelible (unalterable) data object including all metadata.
